Talk_PointB_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00>I want to try traveling like a tumbleweedâ€”
just let the wind take me wherever it feels
like blowing...
Talk_PointA_00:
Are you making sure to prepare against
the desert's cold nights?

<sp:3:0:2:0700>Even the Gerudo, who call this desert
home, say the chill saps their energy.

I'm pretty lucky not to be affected by it,
but as for you...

If the cold is getting to you, you should
check out <clr:0000>Kara Kara Bazaar<clr:ffff>.

Look for the tall <clr:0000>watchtower<clr:ffff>. <sp:5:1:0>You can
use it to tell how far away you are from
the bazaar.
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Ease_00>Although, since crossing the desert is a
real chore, it might be a good idea to rent
a <clr:0000>sand seal<clr:ffff> here.
Talk_PointA_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>If you're making preparations for a
journey, you should check out <clr:0000>Kara Kara
Bazaar <clr:ffff>up ahead.
Look for the tall <clr:0000>watchtower<clr:ffff>. <sp:5:1:0>You can
use it to tell how far away you are from
the bazaar.
Although, since crossing the desert is a
real chore, it might be a good idea to rent
a <clr:0000>sand seal<clr:ffff> here.
Talk_Between_B_Rest_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>The cliffs around here are so high...
I'll have to take the long way around.

I wish I had wings like the Rito do. It'd be
so easy to just fly over the cliffs, then.
SavedLv2_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I was just minding my own business,
enjoying the scenery, when I was
suddenly attacked!
Talk_PointA_02:
Are you making sure to prepare against
the desert's daytime heat?

<sp:3:0:2:0700>Even the Gerudo, who call this desert
home, say the heat saps their energy.

I'm pretty lucky not to be affected by it,
but as for you...

If the hot weather is getting to you,
you should check out <clr:0000>Kara Kara Bazaar<clr:ffff>
up ahead.
Look for the tall <clr:0000>watchtower<clr:ffff>. <sp:5:1:0>You can
use it to tell how far away you are from
the bazaar.
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Ease_00>Although, since crossing the desert is a
real chore, it might be a good idea to rent
a <clr:0000>sand seal<clr:ffff> here.
Talk_Between_B_Rest_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I envy the Rito with their wings... If I had
wings, I could just fly over any obstacle!
Talk_PointA_03:
Are you making sure to prepare against
the desert's extreme weather?

<sp:3:0:2:0700>Even the Gerudo, who call this desert
home, say the desert's days and nights
can sap their energy.
I'm pretty lucky not to be affected by it,
but as for you...

If you're not feeling properly prepared,
you should check out <clr:0000>Kara Kara Bazaar<clr:ffff>
up ahead.
Look for the tall <clr:0000>watchtower<clr:ffff>. <sp:5:1:0>You can
use it to tell how far away you are from
the bazaar.
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Ease_00>Although, since crossing the desert is a
real chore, it might be a good idea to rent
a <clr:0000>sand seal<clr:ffff> here.
Talk_Between_A_Rest_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>It sure is a long way... There used to be a
shorter route too.

But when the Upheaval happened, a flood
came and washed the road away.

If I were a Zora, I could swim it...
Greeting_Morning:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Greeting>Good morning! Or, as the Gerudo say in
their language, "sav'otta"!

Hehe, I just wanted to try saying it.
Talk_Between_A_Rest_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>There used to be a shortcut around here,
but the water has made it impassable. If
only I could swim like a Zora...
<sp:3:0:2:0000>Oh well. <sp:5:0:0>I don't mind walking.
Talk_PointRest_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS_01>The trek through Gerudo Canyon is rough,
but this view always makes it worthwhile.
Talk_PointRest_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad>The view is beautiful, but it's a little
terrifying to be on a bridge so high up...
Atacked00: <sp:3:0:2:0200><snd:Angry>Help me out! This thing is strong!
Atacked01:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>This thing whooshed in and attacked!
Let's take it down together!
Talk_Between_A_Rest_00_Back:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS_01>I sometimes see islands floating around
in the sky.

The little islands remind me of schools
of fish.

And there are big, round islands that look
like me!

<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:TalkPositive>You know, there could be plants and
animals we've never seen before living
on those islands.
I want to go there...
Greeting_Evening:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Greeting>Good evening! Or, as the Gerudo say in
their language, "sav'saaba"!

I made sure to commit that to memory.
Balloon_PointA: I wonder if I can rent one...
Guardian00:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseS_01>A monster as terrifying as that...<sp:5:1:0> I don't
have the strength to stand up to it!
SavedLv3_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>That was really scary!<sp:5:1:0> I thought I was
done for...<sp:5:1:0>
Thanks00:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00>Thank you so much! I'm OK because of
you. <sp:5:1:0>Here, take this as a reward!
SavedLv3_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I could never fight like that.<sp:5:1:0>
So dangerous...<sp:5:1:0>
SavedLv1_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseS_00>I wasn't paying attention for a moment,
and suddenly boom!<sp:5:0:0> I'm being attacked!
Talk_Between_A_Rest_01_Back:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS_01>I love watching all the different islands
floating up there in the sky.

Just thinking about what kinds of plants
and animals live on them is really exciting!
Talk_Between_B_Rest_00_Back:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive>Do you know about tumbleweeds?


They're the weeds rolling around in
Gerudo Canyon.

It's fun to watch them, but did you know
that you can break them open too?
Sometimes you'll find something inside!
Things must get tangled up in them while
they roll around...
Greeting_Noon:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Greeting>Good day! Or, as the Gerudo say in their
language, "sav'aaq"!

I've been studying the language a bit.
Talk_Between_B_Rest_01_Back:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS_01>I love watching tumbleweeds roll around.
It's really entertaining.

Plus! If you break one open, sometimes
you might find that something good has
gotten caught up in it!
Talk_PointB_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS_01>I was just watching the tumbleweeds...


Lately, I've realized how tumbleweeds
tend to just roll around like I do...
